name: df-eqlg
body: |- wceq(ceqlg, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, co(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(ccgrg, cv(s0)), cs3(cfv(cv(s1), nat1), cfv(cv(s1), nat2), cfv(cv(s1), nat0))))))
comment: Define the class of equilateral triangles. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Nov-2019.)
